name: Pokemon Emerald Version
description:
Pokemon Emerald Version is an adventure-RPG game developed by Game Freak and Creatures. It came out on 16-09-2004. It was published by The Pokemon Company. On review aggregator Metacritic, Pokemon Emerald Version has a score of 76. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Pokemon Emerald Version is available on Game Boy Advance.
It was produced by Gakuji Nomoto, Hiroaki Tsuru, Hiroyuki Jinnai and Hitoshi Yamagami. Shigeki Morimoto directed the game. Go Ichinose, Hitomi Sato, Junichi Masuda and Morikazu Aoki scored the game.
